definition: erhua variant of 差點|差点[cha4 dian3]
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
to send/to commission/messenger/mission

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final

sentences.english: It was a 11)dirty trick, but it killed old Phoebe.
sentences.chinese: 这实在是种卑鄙把戏，可差点儿把老菲比笑死。

sentences.english: Ensnared in maya, I am all but dead.
sentences.chinese: 在摩耶的诱捕下，我差点儿死去。

sentences.english: She almost conked out when she caught pneumonia last year.
sentences.chinese: 她去年得了肺炎，差点儿死掉。

sentences.english: In trying to save him I nearly lost my own life, too.
sentences.chinese: 为了救他，我差点儿把命都搭进去了。

sentences.english: Then children do not live to air almost.
Clasping to the masts, he endured a sea that almost split the deck.
sentences.chinese: 他抓紧桅杆，顶着一阵差点儿把甲板冲成两半的海浪。

sentences.english: At one point, she nearly died after catching pneumonia and had to undergo an emergency tracheotomy.
sentences.chinese: 她因为肺炎差点儿丧了命，紧急气管切开术救了她。

sentences.english: It was almost in, but it's definitely out.
sentences.chinese: 球差点儿在界内，不过它肯定是出了界。

sentences.english: In the state of Wei, he was besieged and almost killed since he was regarded mistakenly as Yanghu.
sentences.chinese: 在卫国，被人误认为阳虎而遭困，差点儿丢了老命。

sentences.english: I was so scared that I nearly wet myself.
sentences.chinese: 我真害怕，差点儿尿裤子。

sentences.english: I nearly made a fool of myself about the road signs here.
sentences.chinese: 这路牌差点儿让我闹了个大笑话。

sentences.english: She nearly collapsed and was quickly caught by Severus.
sentences.chinese: 她差点儿瘫倒在地，西弗勒斯急忙扶住了她。

sentences.english: Genscher nearly bled to death but managed to call police.
sentences.chinese: 詹斯特差点儿因失血过多死亡，还好他挣扎着报了警。

sentences.english: I caught the pocket of my coat on a nail; it's nearly torn off.
sentences.chinese: 我的上衣口袋给钉子钩住，差点儿给撕下来。

sentences.english: Snow flying almost crashed into the stone pillars, thanks to Carrie had hand blocking for her in time.
sentences.chinese: 雪飞差点儿撞向石柱，幸得嘉仪及时用手替她挡住。

sentences.english: ASHBY is a coming of age/approaching death comedy drama.
sentences.chinese: 《大叔阿什比》是一部差点儿停拍的喜剧片。

definition: erhua variant of 差一點|差一点[cha4 yi1 dian3]
almost/nearly
narrowly/almost/nearly
see 差點|差点[cha4 dian3]
to have a close call/to have a narrow escape
to cause or lead to sth bad
luckily/fortunately
Geez!/Shoot!/No way!
if it were not for/but for
fortunately/luckily
to scare/to intimidate/to threaten/(interjection showing disapproval) tut-tut/(interjection showing astonishment)
to frighten/to scare
unbearable/terrible/enough/unlikely
half dead (of torment, hunger, tiredness etc)/(tired) to death/(terrified) out of one's wits/(beaten) to within an inch of one's life/(knock) the daylights out of sb
confused/distracted
to play the market/to speculate (on financial markets)/to profiteer
to stagger/to stumble/to reel/Taiwan pr. [lie4 ju1]
